revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}
'''Vavoom''' is a [[source port]] created by Jānis Legzdiņš. While Vavoom was not based on [[ZDoom]], it incorporated many ZDoom and [[GZDoom]] features for cross-compatibility, and reciprocally a few features from it have been adopted in ZDoom and GZDoom.
Vavoom ceased being maintained during 2011 and its home domain expired in 2014.
== External links == * [http://www.vavoom-engine.com/ Vavoom homepage], with dedicated [http://www.vavoom-engine.com/wiki/ wiki]. * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/vavoom/ Sourceforge project page]
[[category:Non-ZDoom source ports]]
